column5: Anyone have any info on where to get the best price on 24"x24" patio stones in the Hamilton area?  Best I found was close to $6 each.  No one seems to have seconds in this early in the summer..  Thanks Sherriff
Try Day and Cambell on Upper Wellington.  They are the manufacurer, and seem to always have seconds and colour offs!  Try them if you have not already.  Easton
